description: This file implements hash functions for TLS Crypto Provider, supporting MD5 and SHA hashing algorithms. It includes functions to perform hashing using specified algorithms, specifically for TLS. The file contains function implementations for TlsCpoHash, TlsCpoHash_MD5, and TlsCpoHash_SHA, which call underlying cryptographic library functions.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS TlsCpoHash(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ULONG hash_algorithm,void * i_data,ULONG i_data_size,void * o_hash,PULONG o_hash_size)
methods.description: Dispatches the hashing request based on the specified algorithm, calling either MD5 or SHA hash functions.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS TlsCpoHash_MD5(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,void * i_data,ULONG i_data_size,void * o_hash,PULONG o_hash_size)
methods.description: Performs MD5 hashing on input data and returns the hash.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS TlsCpoHash_SHA(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,void * i_data,ULONG i_data_size,void * o_hash,PULONG o_hash_size)
methods.description: Performs SHA1 hashing on input data and returns the hash.

ctags.name: TlsCpoHash
ctags.signature: (ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ULONG hash_algorithm,void * i_data,ULONG i_data_size,void * o_hash,PULONG o_hash_size)
